high_descs: Turn around and go near the desk.
Take the pan from the desk.
Turn around and go near the desk lamp.
Put the Pan near the desk lamp and it will be glow.
anns.task_desc: Placed the pan near the desk lamp and it will be glow.

high_descs: Turn around to reach the desk on the right.
Pick up the pan from the desk.
Turn to face the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine the pan under the lamp light.

high_descs: Turn right and head straight, turn right and go straight and then hang left to the desk
pick up a pan from desk
anns.task_desc: Examine a pan by the light of a desk lamp.
